duties_responsibilities.duty: Support priority projects crucial to product development success in the semiconductor industry.
Work with Process Integration Engineering, Manufacturing, and Process Engineering teams.
Identify and fill gaps for data collection on new processes and flows.
Help tackle process issues and assist with SWR support and experiment coordination for PI engineering.
Continuously learn new skills to enable further engineering support opportunities.
Assist with cycle time management and engineering projects with PI Module owners.
Collaborate with key module owners to facilitate SWRs, experiment setup, and resolution of tactical issues.
Assist with Engineering Tasks including data collection and analysis, lot management holds, and line issues.
Supervise line health and drive reduction of preventable yield impacts.

education_certification.credential: A.A.S. in Electronics Engineering Technology or related field
